title: (x) Permastore Tanks & Silos logo - Dynamo, Univers Cond {Akira Yoshino, Yves}
content:
Hi:

It’s me again… I have a client who’s building Water tanks all over the state and wants to include this brand inside his Letterheads, so, any guy from the UK who know this font names…

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/logo_3988.gif)

Any help would be appreciated…

Thanks in advance!
author: Quesito

comments.content:
WOW! That was quick!

And what about the other one? should I try Univers™ Condensed Light?

Somebody?

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!!

I think that’s a safe bet. [See here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20061120151404/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.121025.0.12&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=TANKS+%26+SILOS&sampleSize=24)

Thanks Guys!

Everything is working now…

Cheers!

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!!
